title: Option for longer meeting notes with “take notes for me” in Google Meet
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

Meeting participants can now configure the length of their meeting notes when using the "take notes for me" feature in Google Meet. By selecting
summary: Google Meet is introducing the option for significantly longer meeting notes, expanding beyond the previous 2,500-character limit. These enhanced notes are automatically saved to Google Docs, improving the ability to capture detailed discussions and action items directly from the meeting interface.

title: Available in open beta: Migrate files from Dropbox to Google Drive
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

Beginning today, the new Data Migration Service can be used to migrate files and folders from Dropbox to Google Drive. This allows organizations
summary: Google Drive is simplifying the migration process from Dropbox, allowing administrators to seamlessly transfer files and folder structures to Google Drive. This update aims to ease the transition for organizations consolidating their cloud storage solutions and enhances data management within Google Workspace.

title: Improving secondary calendar management with dedicated owners
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

To improve data governance, we’re changing how secondary calendar ownership is defined in Google Calendar. A secondary calendar is any calendar
summary: Google Calendar is enhancing its management capabilities for secondary calendars, allowing administrators to assign dedicated owners. This update provides greater control over scheduling, ensuring specific users are responsible for managing and maintaining particular calendars, thereby improving organization and accountability.

title: New AI-powered audio overviews for PDFs in Google Drive
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

We’re introducing AI-powered audio overviews for PDFs in Google Drive.

This new Gemini for Google Workspace feature allows your users to ins
summary: Google Drive is introducing AI-powered audio overviews for PDFs, allowing users to listen to summaries of their documents instead of reading them. This accessibility feature leverages artificial intelligence to quickly convey key information from complex documents, enhancing productivity and information consumption on the go.

title: Leverage the power of Gemini models to apply data classification labels in Google Drive - beta applications now open
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

Earlier this year, we announced a
summary: Gemini is integrating with Google Drive to provide AI-powered data classification, automatically categorizing and tagging files based on their content. This enhancement helps organizations improve data governance, security, and discoverability by ensuring sensitive information is correctly identified and managed.

title: Google Workspace Updates Weekly Recap - November 7, 2025
author: Dan C
description:
A summary of announcements from the last week:
The announcements below were published on the
summary: This weekly recap for November 7, 2025, summarizes key updates across Google Workspace, including advancements in Google Meet for longer meeting notes, Google Drive's new migration tools from Dropbox, and enhanced secondary calendar management in Google Calendar. It highlights a range of improvements aimed at boosting productivity and collaboration for users.

title: Use a wider range of emoji reactions in Google Meet
author: Dan C
description:
What’s changing 

Google Meet users now have access to the full emoji library for reactions in Google Meet. Reactions let users engage with the content in a
summary: Google Meet is expanding its range of emoji reactions, offering users more diverse ways to express themselves during video calls without interrupting the speaker. This update enhances non-verbal communication and engagement, allowing participants to share quick feedback and sentiments in a more dynamic and interactive meeting environment.

title: Gemini Deep Research now integrates with your Workspace content
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We’re expanding the capabilities of Gemini’s Deep Research feature by integrating it with your Google Workspace apps. This update allows Deep Res
summary: Gemini is now integrating deep research capabilities directly with Google Workspace content, allowing users to leverage AI for comprehensive analysis of their own documents, emails, and shared files. This feature significantly enhances information synthesis and productivity by providing AI-driven insights relevant to a user's specific work context.

title: Bringing inline threading to direct messages in Google Chat
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We’re excited to announce that inline threading is rolling out for direct messages (DMs) and group direct messages (gDMs) in Google Chat. This ha
summary: Google Chat is introducing inline threading for direct messages, allowing users to respond directly to specific messages within a 1:1 or group chat. This feature improves conversation clarity and organization by keeping related replies grouped together, making it easier to follow discussions and manage multiple topics simultaneously.

title: Set sharing expirations on files and folders in shared drives
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We previously in
summary: Google Workspace is enhancing data security and management by allowing users to set sharing expirations for files and folders directly within Google Drive. This feature ensures that access to sensitive documents automatically revokes after a specified period, reducing the risk of unauthorized long-term access and improving compliance.

title: Updated Chat header helps you navigate chat more quickly and easily
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We are introducing a redesigned Google Chat conversation header on the web. The new header offers a simpler, more consistent layout that makes key
summary: Google Chat is rolling out an updated header and navigation experience designed to improve user efficiency and accessibility across conversations. This redesign aims to simplify the interface, making it easier for users to find important chats, access features, and manage their communications within Google Workspace.

title: Controls for restricting conversation creation in Google Chat available to more organizations
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We are expanding an existing Google Chat feature, previously
summary: Google Chat is introducing new administrative controls that allow organizations to restrict who can create new conversations, improving communication governance. This feature provides IT administrators with granular control over chat initiation, helping to maintain order, prevent spam, and ensure relevant communication channels within Google Workspace.

title: New to Google Meet: Continue your conversations in Google Chat
author: Dan C
description:
What’s happening? 

Starting November 10, your Google Meet in-meeting messages will be powered by and available in Google Chat. 

<
summary: Google is enabling seamless transitions between Google Chat and Google Meet, allowing users to easily continue their text conversations with a video call or vice versa. This integration streamlines communication workflows, facilitating a more natural and efficient shift between different modes of collaboration within Google Workspace.

title: Google Workspace Updates Weekly Recap - October 31, 2025
author: Dan C
description:
A summary of announcements from the last two weeks:
The announcements below were published on the
summary: This weekly recap for October 31, 2025, covers recent Google Workspace updates including enhanced writing assistance with Gemini in Google Docs, improvements to Google Chat's Workday app integration, and more powerful pivot tables in Google Sheets' Connected Sheets. The summary also touches on enhanced admin audit logs and new presentation generation capabilities via Gemini.

title: Improving the Workday Google Chat app
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

The latest update  for Workd
summary: The Workday app integration within Google Chat is receiving improvements to enhance HR and financial workflows, allowing users to access Workday functionalities directly from Chat. This update aims to streamline common tasks such as time-off requests, expense reporting, and accessing payslips, boosting productivity and collaboration within Google Workspace.

title: Improve your writing by grounding Gemini in Google Docs in sources
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We’re excited to announce source-grounded writing help in Google Docs. Gemini will automatically curate a list of sources linked in your document a
summary: Gemini in Google Docs is being enhanced to improve writing by leveraging user-provided sources, allowing the AI to generate text that is more accurate and contextually relevant. This feature empowers users to create higher-quality documents and research papers by grounding Gemini's suggestions in specific, reliable information.

title: More powerful pivot tables in Connected Sheets
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

We are rolling out two significant updates to Connected Sheets pivot tables backed by BigQuery, designed to increase analytical capacity
summary: Google Sheets' Connected Sheets feature is gaining more powerful pivot table capabilities, enabling users to perform advanced data analysis directly on data sourced from BigQuery and other external databases. This enhancement allows for more complex insights and robust reporting without leaving the familiar Sheets interface, boosting productivity for data analysts.

title: Enhanced admin audit log events
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We are updating the schema and event modeling for several Admin audit log events, specifically some of the events related to account security, Gm
summary: Google Workspace administrators are gaining access to enhanced audit log events, providing more detailed insights into user activities and administrative changes across the suite. This improvement strengthens security, compliance monitoring, and incident response capabilities, offering greater transparency and control for IT departments.

title: Generate presentations in the Gemini app
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We are introducing the ability to create slide presentations in the Gemini app through Canvas. Simply provide an idea with a simple text prompt o
summary: The Gemini app is now capable of generating full presentations from text prompts, allowing users to quickly create professional-looking slideshows. This AI-powered feature streamlines content creation for pitches, reports, and educational materials, significantly reducing the time and effort required to design impactful presentations.

title: New LaTeX features in the Gemini app
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

We are introducing improved LaTeX rendering and PDF export capabilities directly within the Gemini app. LaTeX is a document preparation system w
summary: The Gemini app is introducing new LaTeX features, enabling users to create and edit complex mathematical equations and scientific notations more easily. This enhancement caters to academic and scientific users, making Gemini a more powerful tool for generating technical documents and research papers with precise formatting.

title: Introducing a new waiting rooms experience in Google Meet
author: Victor Ome
description:
What's happening

We’re introducing waiting rooms in Google Meet, giving you more control over your meetings. As a meeting host or co-host, you can choose to have p
summary: Google Meet is rolling out enhanced waiting rooms, giving meeting hosts greater control over who enters a meeting, with options to admit, deny, or even chat with participants before they join. These new features improve security and privacy for virtual meetings, ensuring only authorized individuals can access sensitive discussions.

title: Ask Gemini in Google Meet coming to Workspace enterprise customers
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

Last month, we announced that Ask Gemin
summary: Gemini is integrating with Google Meet, allowing participants to "Ask Gemini" directly within a meeting for real-time information, summaries, or to answer questions based on the meeting context or broader knowledge. This AI assistant enhances meeting productivity by providing instant insights and reducing the need to switch applications during a call.

title: Use emoji reactions in your client-side encrypted documents
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We’re excited to announce that client-side encrypted (CSE) files including Google Docs, Sheets and Slides now support emoji reactions. Users can us
summary: Google Docs is enabling emoji reactions for client-side encrypted (CSE) documents, allowing users to express themselves without compromising the document's enhanced security. This feature balances strong encryption with collaborative expressiveness, making encrypted documents more interactive while maintaining data privacy standards.

title: Educators can now convert rubrics in Google Classroom from Drive or local files with help from Gemini
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

This year, we’ve been bringing the capabilities of Gemini into Google Classroom to help educators get help with common tasks. In June, we
summary: Educators can now use Gemini to convert rubrics from Google Classroom and Google Drive into various formats, streamlining the assessment and feedback process. This AI-powered tool simplifies grading and helps teachers efficiently adapt rubrics for different assignments or share them across platforms, saving valuable time.

title: AI credit overages admin control and related billing
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

We previously
summary: Google Workspace is introducing new administrative controls for AI credit overages, allowing organizations to manage and monitor their spending on AI features like Gemini more effectively. This update provides transparency into usage and billing, helping IT admins control costs associated with advanced AI capabilities within their workspace.

title: Protecting Gmail users from XS-Search with Cross-Origin Opener Policy (COOP)
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s happening

Gmail is enhancing user security by enabling the
summary: Google is enhancing Gmail's security to protect users from XS-Search (Cross-Site Search) attacks, which exploit search functionalities to infer sensitive information. This update reinforces user privacy and data security by implementing advanced safeguards against sophisticated web vulnerabilities, ensuring a safer email experience.

title: Gemini in Google Sheets can now analyze data across multiple tables
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

Starting today, Gemini in Sheets can understand and analyze multiple tables within a single tab of a spreadsheet.  This new functionalit
summary: Gemini is integrating with Google Sheets to provide AI-powered data analysis capabilities, allowing users to ask natural language questions about their data and receive insights or formula suggestions. This enhancement democratizes data analysis, making it easier for users of all skill levels to extract meaningful information and trends from their spreadsheets.

title: Google Workspace Updates Weekly Recap - October 17, 2025
author: Dan C
description:
A summary of announcements from this week:
The announcements below were published on the
summary: This weekly recap for October 17, 2025, highlights new features such as AI credit overage controls and billing transparency for admins, enhanced Gmail protection against XS-Search attacks, and Gemini's new data analysis capabilities in Google Sheets. It also mentions the release of Flashcards in Gemini and new business continuity editions for Google Workspace.

title: Flashcards in Gemini are now available to users of all ages
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

Google Workspace for Education users of all ages can now use Flashcards in Gemini. Users can ask Gemini to instantly create flashcards and study gu
summary: Flashcards are now available within the Gemini app, offering an AI-powered tool for learning and memorization across various subjects. This feature leverages Gemini's capabilities to generate, organize, and present flashcards, enhancing study efficiency for students and professionals alike.

title: Introducing Business Continuity editions: Support business continuity and resilience for enterprise customers
author: Dan C
description:
What’s changing 

When your primary systems are compromised, you need a dependable partner to keep your organization operational. Our new Business Continuity
summary: Google Workspace is introducing new Business Continuity Editions designed to ensure organizations maintain operations during outages or disasters, offering enhanced resilience and recovery options. These editions provide advanced backup, data replication, and failover capabilities, underscoring Google's commitment to enterprise reliability and data protection.

title: Your organization's logo will now appear in the Gemini app
author: Victor Ome
description:
What’s changing

Similar to other Google Workspace service pages, your organization’s logo will now appear next to a user’s profile picture in the Gemini app when t
summary: Google Workspace is rolling out an update that allows organizations' logos to appear more prominently across various Google services, enhancing brand identity and user experience. This customization feature helps reinforce corporate branding within the Google Workspace environment, creating a more cohesive and professional interface for employees.

title: Gemini in Google Sheets now tackles multi-step tasks with expanded editing capabilities
author: Dan C
description:
What’s changing 

Earlier this year, we introduced powerful
summary: Gemini in Google Sheets is receiving expanded editing capabilities, enabling users to modify and refine AI-generated content or formulas more intuitively. This enhancement allows for greater control and customization over AI suggestions, making Gemini a more flexible and powerful co-editor for complex data manipulation and analysis within spreadsheets.
